price: 95. Loba: Allah olobi bosembo ete: Bolanda bosôló ya lingomba ya Ibrâhîm na kati ya bomoko ya Allah, kasi (Ibrâhîm) azalaki te elongo na baye basangisaki (Allah).
arabic: قُلۡ صَدَقَ ٱللَّهُۗ فَٱتَّبِعُواْ مِلَّةَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفٗاۖ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul ṣadaqa al-lahu fa-ittabiʿū millata ib'rāhīma ḥanīfan wamā kāna mina al-mush'rikīna
